
Introduction

==========================
This shiny app will help user to calculate the BMI and give a recommended daily steps based on the user's aim. 

This Shiny app have the following functions: 

1. Calculate the body mass index(BMI)
2. Compare the BMI calculated with the NHS defined healthy weight regions
3. Calculate the recommended steps per day based on the user's aim

##Body Mass Index
The BMI for a person is defined as their body mass divided by the square of their heightâ€”with the value universally being given in units of kg/m2
Please refer to the wiki page below for more details. 
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Body_mass_index

##Healthy BMI Region
The region is given by the NHS website below.
http://www.nhs.uk/Tools/Pages/Healthyweightcalculator.aspx

##Instruction
To calculate the BMI, first user must input the weight (in kilograms) and hight (in meters) then click on the "Calculate BMI" button. 

Then choose the aim for their work-out, whether to loss weight, maintian current weight or gain weight. Then, based on this choice, a recommended total steps (per day) will be shown.
